name: Entei
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.

abilities.name: Howl
abilities.effect: When you play Entei from your hand, you may discard the top 5 cards of your deck. (If you have fewer cards in your deck than that, discard all of them.) If any of those are {R} Energy cards, attach them to any of your {R} Pokémon of your choice. Using this power ends your turn.

attacks.name: Searing Flames
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy cards attached to Entei or this attack does nothing.
